description: This file defines the SubstitutionSource interface, which declares methods for classes that provide variable or property values for substitution purposes. It includes method signatures for checking existence and type of variables, retrieving variable values, and obtaining all known keys.

classes.name: SubstitutionSource
classes.description: An interface for sources providing variable and property values used during substitution processes.

methods.name: hasStringVariable
methods.description: Checks if a variable identified by 'key' exists and is stored as a String.

methods.name: hasObjectVariable
methods.description: Checks if a variable identified by 'key' exists and is stored as a non-String object.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Retrieves the String value of the variable identified by 'key'. Only called if hasStringVariable() returns true.

methods.name: getObject
methods.description: Retrieves the Object value of the variable identified by 'key'. Only called if hasObjectVariable() returns true.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns all of the keys that this source knows about.
